alert.note: Alert for Irion; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 7:10PM CDT until June 23 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Schleicher County in west central Texas... Southeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... Southeastern Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Twin Buttes Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... San Angelo and Lake Nasworthy around 715 PM CDT. Christoval around 725 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 730 PM CDT. Wall around 745 PM CDT. Veribest around 750 PM CDT. Vancourt around 805 PM CDT. Mereta around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
